Title: Seven Days... Seven Nights
Writer: Marguerite Duras (novel), Marguerite Duras (adaptation), Gérard Jarlot (adaptation)
Actors: Jeanne Moreau, Jean-Paul Belmondo, Pascale de Boysson, Jean Deschamps
Plot: A wealthy and bored woman is witness of a murder in affection and meets another witness. She asks him about the history of the victim and falls in love with him.
